name: Slime Life For Life (LDJam 44)
description:
Yeah! Finally I have made it! It’s just a very simple game …… Originally I have designed it to be more complicated and there is no music and sfx. Sosad!!! Because You know time is limited……

Here are some instruction of the game:

Control: WASD and Mouse Left Button Interact: E Pause/Exit(not for exit the game)Menu: Esc

  1. Sacrifice your life value > get the raw material.
  2. Donate the raw materials to the angel > get life value
  3. Put raw materials into the mixer > better items(Get more life value than raw materials by donating to the angel)
  4. Life Value decrease by time
  5. Life Value = 0 > GameOver~~

That’s it~ Hope you enjoy my creation~~
